resources.string: State Quiz
1) What is the capital of Massachusetts?"
Boston
2) How many states are there in the United States?
3) What is the oldest state in the United States?
Enter name of state
Delaware
4) What state was most recently added to the United States?
Hawaii
5) Old Faithful in Yellowstone National Park is in what state?
Wyoming
6) Little Rock is the capital of which state?
Arkansas
7) What states have produces the most Presidents? Hint: According to where they were born?
Virginia
8) How many states were in the original colonies?
9) What two states are not a part of the continental United States?
Alaska
Hawaii
10) How many states does the Mississippi River flow through?
